sn34.53-54:1.3: samādhismiṃ sātaccakārī hoti, na samādhismiṃ sakkaccakārī …
sn34.53-54:1.4: neva samādhismiṃ sakkaccakārī hoti, na ca samādhismiṃ sātaccakārī …

sn34.53-54:2.1: Tepaññāsamaṃ. “Samādhismiṃ sakkaccakārī hoti, na samādhismiṃ sappāyakārī …pe….
